verses.plain: Praise ye the LORD. Praise ye the name of the LORD; praise him, O ye servants of the LORD.

tokens.t: . Praise ye the name of the

verses.plain: Ye that stand in the house of the LORD, in the courts of the house of our God,

tokens.t: Ye that stand in the house of the
, in the courts of the house of our God,

verses.plain: Praise the LORD; for the LORD is good: sing praises unto his name; for it is pleasant.

tokens.t: good: sing praises unto his name; for

verses.plain: For the LORD hath chosen Jacob unto himself, and Israel for his peculiar treasure.
For I know that the LORD is great, and that our Lord is above all gods.
Whatsoever the LORD pleased, that did he in heaven, and in earth, in the seas, and all deep places.

tokens.t: did he in heaven, and in earth, in the seas, and all deep places.

verses.plain: He causeth the vapours to ascend from the ends of the earth; he maketh lightnings for the rain; he bringeth the wind out of his treasuries.

tokens.t: He causeth the vapours to ascend from the ends of the earth; he maketh lightnings for the rain; he bringeth the wind out of his treasuries.

verses.plain: Who smote the firstborn of Egypt, both of man and beast.

tokens.t: Who smote the firstborn of Egypt, both of man and beast.

verses.plain: Who sent tokens and wonders into the midst of thee, O Egypt, upon Pharaoh, and upon all his servants.

tokens.t: sent tokens and wonders into the midst of thee, O Egypt, upon Pharaoh, and upon all his servants.

verses.plain: Who smote great nations, and slew mighty kings;

tokens.t: Who smote great nations, and slew mighty kings;

verses.plain: Sihon king of the Amorites, and Og king of Bashan, and all the kingdoms of Canaan:

tokens.t: Sihon king of the Amorites, and Og king of Bashan, and all the kingdoms of Canaan:

verses.plain: And gave their land for an heritage, an heritage unto Israel his people.

tokens.t: an heritage, an heritage unto Israel his people.

verses.plain: Thy name, O LORD, endureth for ever; and thy memorial, O LORD, throughout all generations.
For the LORD will judge his people, and he will repent himself concerning his servants.

tokens.t: will judge his people, and he will repent himself concerning his servants.

verses.plain: The idols of the heathen are silver and gold, the work of men’s hands.

tokens.t: silver and gold, the work of men’s hands.

verses.plain: They have mouths, but they speak not; eyes have they, but they see not;

tokens.t: They have mouths, but they speak not; eyes have they, but they see not;

verses.plain: They have ears, but they hear not; neither is there any breath in their mouths.

tokens.t: They have ears, but they hear not; neither is there

verses.plain: They that make them are like unto them: so is every one that trusteth in them.

tokens.t: They that make them are like unto them:
every one that trusteth in them.

verses.plain: Bless the LORD, O house of Israel: bless the LORD, O house of Aaron:

tokens.t: , O house of Israel: bless the

verses.plain: Bless the LORD, O house of Levi: ye that fear the LORD, bless the LORD.

tokens.t: , O house of Levi: ye that fear the

verses.plain: Blessed be the LORD out of Zion, which dwelleth at Jerusalem. Praise ye the LORD.

tokens.t: out of Zion, which dwelleth at Jerusalem. Praise ye the

throughout…: Heb. to generation and generation
